alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Armstrong, southeastern Carson, Gray and western Donley Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Pampa to 10 miles northeast of Groom to 12 miles east of Wayside. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Groom, Lefors, Kingsmill, Lake Mcclellan and Goodnight. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
